text.p: The vector [mathjaxinline]w = \left[\begin{array}{c} 1 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline] is an element of which of the following vector spaces? Click all that apply.

font.p: The vector [mathjaxinline]w[/mathjaxinline] has 4 real entries. Thus, it is an element of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^4[/mathjaxinline].

It is not an element of (for instance) [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline]. The vector [mathjaxinline]\left[\begin{array}{c} 1 \\ -1 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline] is an element of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline], but this is not the same as [mathjaxinline]w[/mathjaxinline].
